title: New York Prepares for Healthcare Disruptions as Covid-19 Vaccine Mandate Takes Effect
sub_head: Gov. Kathy Hochul said she was ready to dispatch the National Guard for any healthcare-staff shortages
body:
New York state’s healthcare system is bracing for staff shortages this week as a vaccine mandate took effect at midnight on Monday, presenting the largest test case so far of how similar requirements will play out across the country.
The mandate was beginning amid legal uncertainty for similar vaccine requirements in the state. A federal appeals court late Monday reversed an action that blocked a vaccine mandate for New York City’s public school workers.
